passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against champions deal {{as|{{as|{{fd|1.2}}% '''maximum''' mana}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}. Can only be triggered on the same target once every {{fd|6.5}} seconds from the same attack or cast.
